title: Yedho Mayakkam Lyrics Billa 2 Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Yedho Mayakkam
Singers: Yuvan Shankar Raja, Tanvi Shah
Movie: Billa 2
Lyrics : Na MuthuKumar

Yedho yedho oru mayakkam
engo kaatril niraindhirukum
Ulle ulle unai elupum
ulle vanthaal nenju valukkum
Indha ulagam puthu ulagam
kan thirandhum kanavulagam

I like the way you move
you like the way i move
why dont we dance together all night long..

Nee thedum aan magan..
un thoda thaen magan
un munee chuda chuda anaithida vaa
Bounce Bounce Bounce with me
Bounce Bounce Bounce with me

Kannodu paarpadhu.. neril kaanum poiyada
kaneerai paarthidu.. meiyaagum poiye
ennena vendumo inge vanthu uyida
enthan ullam koiyada.. paiyaa

Vizhigalil oru bothai..irunthaale
nee indrai indrai vellalam
venraale thaanale indha ulagam pinaale

Un vaazhkai udaintha vaazhkai
kannodu serthu vaikai
povom va va puthu ulagam kaanbom.

I am gonna get me to my pop beat to low ..
we gonna move together and rock on the floor
coz I wanna say na na na yeyo yeoh..
come closer to me poppy yeyo yeoh.
slant with me na na na yeyo yeoh..
da da dance with me na na na yeyo yeoh

Girl,
Bounce Bounce Bounce with me
Bounce Bounce Bounce with me
